ygData.subject: How tall is your character?

Subject: How tall is your character?

In an effort to streamline a bit and to bring us more in line with the
predominantly Beast Wars style of the game that is a question I am
putting out there.

WHAT SIZE IS YOUR CCHARACTER

Beast Wars pretty much had the sizes: Basic, Deluxe, Mega, Ultra

For the characters that are part of the Beast Wars line we already can
get the sizes, but for those who have made up characters or who have
imported them from other realms, how big are they?

Yeah I know that sizes tended to fluxuate somewhat, but I am looking
to get somewhat standard if I can.

To help I have put a list in the files section listing the sizes of
different ones. I know it may not list EVERY character, but it hits
most. And generally a mega is bigger than a Deluxe and a Deluxe bigger
than a basic although there may be some exceptions. I do believe Rat
Trap made it to Deluxe as a TM, but never got any taller.

I can start:

Rodimus Prime, being a Prime should be the same size as Optimus which
would make him an Ultra.

Cyclonus I would make the same size, since at times he was drawn as
big or even bigger than Galvatron and comparable to Ultra Magnus. So
he would be leader sized.

Scourge is somewhat smaller and would be a Mega
Deepstryke would be a mega
Phobia and Black Razor would be Deluxes.
Lord Elder, as he is based on K9 would be a Deluxe.

As suggestions:

Tuscon = Ultra
Hydras = Ultra
Nightshift = Mega or more likely Deluxe
Straight Shot = Basic
Quickstride = Deluxe

What are your thoughts?

- Preston
